name: Dungeon Escape (itch) (GurkusTheHoly)
description:
While clearing a dungeon you and your friend find the entrance was shut and the outside unaccesible. Furthermore your friend has suffered a fatal wound and your food supplies are low. Find a way to open the gates hindering you from escaping and simultaniosly  find things to eat and stay alive.

Controls:

move forward : W

turn right/left: D/A

(only when unlocked) place bomb infront of you: E

(only when unlocked) dash two spaces, possible over ledges: Q

interact/collect things by clicking on them
